leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 工程仿真-FEA/多物理场求解生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 建模→求解→后处理→反问题→验证

queries: [GH] deep learning for partial differential equations
[WEB] physics informed neural networks pinn library github
[WEB] neural operator fno deeponet toolkit github
[WEB] scientific machine learning sciml pde solver github
[WEB] deep learning pde solver framework github
[WEB] physics informed deep learning library github

tools.name: Conservative_PINNs
tools.one_line_profile: Implementation of Conservative Physics-Informed Neural Networks (cPINN) for nonlinear conservation laws
tools.detailed_description: A reference implementation for Conservative Physics-Informed Neural Networks (cPINNs) that enforces flux continuity across decomposed sub-domains, suitable for solving nonlinear conservation laws.

tools.name: XPINNs
tools.one_line_profile: Extended Physics-Informed Neural Networks for generalized space-time domain decomposition
tools.detailed_description: A framework for Extended Physics-Informed Neural Networks (XPINNs), enabling generalized space-time domain decomposition for solving nonlinear partial differential equations using deep learning.

tools.name: Seeq
tools.one_line_profile: Hybrid Physics-Informed Machine Learning library
tools.detailed_description: A library for hybrid physics-informed machine learning, designed to integrate physical laws with data-driven models for scientific discovery and simulation.

tools.name: EFDO
tools.one_line_profile: Neural operator network for fast forward modeling of magnetotelluric data
tools.detailed_description: A neural operator-based tool for fast forward modeling of magnetotelluric data in complex media, facilitating efficient geophysical simulations.

tools.name: pdequinox
tools.one_line_profile: Neural Emulator Architectures in JAX
tools.detailed_description: A JAX-based library providing neural emulator architectures for solving partial differential equations, leveraging the Equinox framework.

tools.name: CRNN
tools.one_line_profile: Chemical Reaction Neural Network solver
tools.detailed_description: A Julia-based tool for modeling chemical kinetics using Chemical Reaction Neural Networks, integrating neural networks with mass action law constraints.

tools.name: Stiff-PINN
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-Informed Neural Network for Stiff Chemical Kinetics
tools.detailed_description: A specialized Physics-Informed Neural Network (PINN) implementation designed to handle stiff chemical kinetics problems effectively.

tools.name: pinn-pytorch
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning library for solving differential equations on PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch-based deep learning library specifically designed for solving differential equations using Physics-Informed Neural Networks.

tools.name: separable-operator-networks
tools.one_line_profile: Extreme-scale operator learning for parametric PDEs
tools.detailed_description: Official implementation of Separable Operator Networks, designed for extreme-scale operator learning to solve parametric partial differential equations efficiently.

tools.name: simulai
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for physics-informed machine learning pipelines
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit with data-driven pipelines for physics-informed machine learning.

tools.name: AI4PDEs
tools.one_line_profile: PDE solvers expressed as neural networks
tools.detailed_description: PDE solvers expressed as neural networks.

tools.name: JAX-DIPS
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable interfacial PDE solver
tools.detailed_description: JAX-DIPS is a differentiable interfacial PDE solver.

tools.name: PinnDE
tools.one_line_profile: Library for solving differential equations with PINNs and DeepONets
tools.detailed_description: PinnDE: A Python library for solving differential equations with physics informed neural networks and deep operator networks.

tools.name: NeurOLight
tools.one_line_profile: Neural Operator-based Integrated Photonic Device Simulation Framework
tools.detailed_description: A Neural Operator-based Integrated Photonic Device Simulation Framework, NeurOLight NeurIPS 2022.

tools.name: KoopmanLab
tools.one_line_profile: Library for Koopman Neural Operator with Pytorch
tools.detailed_description: A library for Koopman Neural Operator with Pytorch.

tools.name: SymbolicRegression.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Distributed High-Performance Symbolic Regression in Julia
tools.detailed_description: Distributed High-Performance Symbolic Regression in Julia.

tools.name: physicsnemo
tools.one_line_profile: Deep-learning framework for Physics-ML methods
tools.detailed_description: Open-source deep-learning framework for building, training, and fine-tuning deep learning models using state-of-the-art Physics-ML methods.

tools.name: neurodiffeq
tools.one_line_profile: Library for solving differential equations using neural networks
tools.detailed_description: A library for solving differential equations using neural networks based on PyTorch, used by multiple research groups around the world.

tools.name: ODINN.jl
tools.one_line_profile: SciML glacier model
tools.detailed_description: SciML glacier model.

tools.name: nr3d_lib
tools.one_line_profile: Modules and operators for 3D neural rendering
tools.detailed_description: Modules, operators and utilities for 3D neural rendering in single-object, multi-object, categorical and large-scale scenes.

tools.name: pinn
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-informed neural networks package
tools.detailed_description: Physics-informed neural networks package.

tools.name: PaddleScience
tools.one_line_profile: SDK for AI-driven scientific computing based on PaddlePaddle
tools.detailed_description: PaddleScience is SDK and library for developing AI-driven scientific computing applications based on PaddlePaddle.

tools.name: NeuralSolvers
tools.one_line_profile: Neural network based solvers for PDEs and inverse problems
tools.detailed_description: Neural network based solvers for partial differential equations and inverse problems. Implementation of physics-informed neural networks in pytorch.

tools.name: PINNs-MPF
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-Informed Neural Network framework for Multi-Phase-Field problems
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive framework designed for simulating interface dynamics using Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINNs), specifically targeting the multi-phase-field model.

tools.name: phlearn
tools.one_line_profile: Library for modelling pseudo-Hamiltonian systems using PHNNs
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for modelling pseudo-Hamiltonian systems by pseudo-Hamiltonian neural networks (PHNN), applicable to both ODEs and PDEs. Developed by SINTEF.

tools.name: AutoOptimize.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic optimization and parallelization for SciML
tools.detailed_description: A tool for automatic optimization and parallelization of scientific machine learning codes within the Julia SciML ecosystem.

tools.name: Catalyst.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Chemical reaction network and systems biology modeling interface
tools.detailed_description: A domain-specific language and library for modeling chemical reaction networks and systems biology, offering high-performance solvers and GPU parallelization.

tools.name: DataDrivenDiffEq.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Automated discovery of dynamical systems and data-driven modeling
tools.detailed_description: A library for data-driven modeling and automated discovery of dynamical systems (SINDy, etc.) from data, part of the SciML ecosystem.

tools.name: DiffEqBase.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Base library for differential equation definitions in SciML
tools.detailed_description: The core library defining shared types and interfaces for differential equations and scientific machine learning problems in the Julia ecosystem.

tools.name: DiffEqBayes.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian parameter estimation for differential equations
tools.detailed_description: Extension functionality using Stan.jl, Turing.jl, etc., to perform Bayesian probabilistic scientific machine learning and parameter estimation for differential equations.

tools.name: DiffEqCallbacks.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Callback library for differential equation solvers
tools.detailed_description: A library providing useful callbacks for hybrid scientific machine learning and augmented differential equation solvers (e.g., event handling).

tools.name: DiffEqFlux.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Neural differential equations and scientific machine learning architectures
tools.detailed_description: Provides pre-built implicit layer architectures, Neural ODEs, and physics-informed machine learning methods with O(1) backprop and GPU support.

tools.name: DiffEqGPU.jl
tools.one_line_profile: GPU acceleration for differential equation solvers
tools.detailed_description: GPU-acceleration routines for DifferentialEquations.jl and the broader SciML ecosystem, enabling massive parallelism for simulation.

tools.name: DiffEqOperators.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Linear operators for differential equation discretization
tools.detailed_description: Provides linear operators for finite difference discretizations of differential equations, facilitating numerical solving in SciML.

tools.name: DiffEqPhysics.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-based differential equation builder
tools.detailed_description: A library for building differential equations arising from physical problems (e.g., Hamiltonian/Lagrangian mechanics) for use in SciML.

tools.name: DiffEqProblemLibrary.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Library of differential equation problems for benchmarking
tools.detailed_description: A collection of premade differential equation problems used for testing solvers and benchmarking SciML tools.

tools.name: DifferentialEquations.jl
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance differential equation solvers suite
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive suite for solving ODEs, SDEs, DDEs, DAEs, and more, serving as the backbone for scientific machine learning in Julia.

tools.name: ExponentialUtilities.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Matrix exponential utilities for SciML
tools.detailed_description: Fast and differentiable implementations of matrix exponentials and Krylov subspace methods for exponential integrators.

tools.name: FEniCS.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia wrapper for FEniCS Finite Element library
tools.detailed_description: A Scientific Machine Learning (SciML) wrapper for the FEniCS Finite Element library, allowing integration of FEniCS PDE solvers with Julia's ecosystem.

tools.name: FluxNeuralOperators.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Neural Operators library for Julia
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of DeepONets, Fourier Neural Operators (FNO), and Physics-Informed Neural Operators for operator learning tasks.

tools.name: HighDimPDE.jl
tools.one_line_profile: High-dimensional PDE solver using Deep BSDE
tools.detailed_description: A package for solving high-dimensional PDEs using Deep Backwards Stochastic Differential Equation (Deep BSDE) and Feynman-Kac methods.

tools.name: Integrals.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Numerical integration interface for SciML
tools.detailed_description: A common interface for quadrature and numerical integration methods, supporting various backends for scientific computing.

tools.name: JumpProcesses.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Jump process simulation library
tools.detailed_description: Library for building and simulating jump equations (e.g., Gillespie simulations, jump diffusions) within the SciML ecosystem.

tools.name: LabelledArrays.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Labelled arrays for scientific modeling
tools.detailed_description: Provides array types where elements can be accessed by label, facilitating readable and maintainable scientific model definitions.

tools.name: LinearSolve.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Unified interface for linear solvers
tools.detailed_description: High-performance unified interface for linear solvers, allowing easy switching between factorization and Krylov methods with preconditioners.

tools.name: MethodOfLines.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic Finite Difference PDE solver
tools.detailed_description: A package for automated Finite Difference discretization of PDEs using the Method of Lines, integrated with the SciML ecosystem.

tools.name: ModelingToolkit.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Acausal modeling and symbolic transformation framework
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive acausal modeling framework and computer algebra system for defining, transforming, and optimizing differential equation models.

tools.name: ModelingToolkitStandardLibrary.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Standard component library for ModelingToolkit
tools.detailed_description: A library of pre-built components (electrical, mechanical, thermal, etc.) for modeling physical systems using ModelingToolkit.jl.

tools.name: MultiScaleArrays.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-scale array framework for simulations
tools.detailed_description: A framework for developing and handling multi-scale arrays, useful for biological and physical simulations involving hierarchical structures.

tools.name: NBodySimulator.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable N-body simulator
tools.detailed_description: A differentiable simulator for N-body problems, suitable for astrophysical and molecular dynamics simulations within the SciML framework.

tools.name: NeuralOperators.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Neural Operators library
tools.detailed_description: Provides implementations of DeepONets, Fourier Neural Operators, and other operator learning architectures for solving PDEs.

tools.name: NeuralPDE.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINN) solver
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive library for solving Partial Differential Equations using Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINNs) and other SciML methods.

tools.name: NonlinearSolve.jl
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance nonlinear solvers
tools.detailed_description: Provides high-performance, differentiation-enabled nonlinear solvers (Newton methods, bracketed rootfinding) with sparsity support.

tools.name: ODE.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Basic ODE solvers (Legacy)
tools.detailed_description: A collection of basic Ordinary Differential Equation solvers. Note: This package is largely deprecated in favor of DifferentialEquations.jl.

tools.name: OperatorLearning.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Operator learning utilities
tools.detailed_description: A library focused on operator learning techniques for scientific machine learning.

tools.name: Optimization.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Unified mathematical optimization interface
tools.detailed_description: A unified interface for local, global, gradient-based, and derivative-free optimization, supporting linear, quadratic, and nonlinear problems.

tools.name: OrdinaryDiffEq.jl
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance ODE and DAE solvers
tools.detailed_description: The core component of DifferentialEquations.jl providing high-performance solvers for ODEs and DAEs, including implicit and explicit methods.

tools.name: ParameterizedFunctions.jl
tools.one_line_profile: DSL for defining differential equations
tools.detailed_description: A simple domain-specific language (DSL) for defining parameterized differential equations, simplifying model creation for SciML.

tools.name: QuasiMonteCarlo.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Quasi-Monte Carlo sequence generation
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight library for generating quasi-Monte Carlo sequences for parameter exploration and sampling in scientific machine learning.

tools.name: RecursiveArrayTools.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for recursive array structures
tools.detailed_description: Utilities for handling complex nested array structures (arrays of arrays) commonly found in scientific simulations and differential equation solvers.

tools.name: ReservoirComputing.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Reservoir computing library for SciML
tools.detailed_description: A library providing reservoir computing architectures (Echo State Networks, etc.) for scientific machine learning and time series prediction.

tools.name: SciMLBase.jl
tools.one_line_profile: SciML ecosystem base interface
tools.detailed_description: The foundational library defining the abstract interfaces and types used across the entire Julia Scientific Machine Learning ecosystem.

tools.name: SciMLBenchmarks.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Scientific Machine Learning benchmarks suite
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive benchmarking suite for scientific machine learning and differential equation solvers, covering Julia, Python, and other languages.

tools.name: SciMLExpectations.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Uncertainty quantification for SciML
tools.detailed_description: A library for fast uncertainty quantification and expectation calculations in scientific machine learning and differential equations.

tools.name: SciMLSensitivity.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Sensitivity analysis for scientific models
tools.detailed_description: Enables sensitivity analysis and gradient calculations for differential equations (ODEs, SDEs, etc.), supporting adjoint methods for SciML training.

tools.name: StochasticDiffEq.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Solvers for stochastic differential equations in the SciML ecosystem
tools.detailed_description: A component of the SciML ecosystem providing robust solvers for stochastic differential equations (SDEs), integrating with the broader scientific machine learning framework.

tools.name: Sundials.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia interface to the Sundials library for ODEs and DAEs
tools.detailed_description: Provides a Julia interface to the Sundials C library, enabling access to high-performance solvers like CVODE and IDA for ordinary and differential-algebraic equations.

tools.name: Surrogates.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Surrogate modeling and optimization library for SciML
tools.detailed_description: A library for building surrogate models (kriging, radial basis functions, etc.) and performing optimization, designed for scientific machine learning applications.

tools.name: TensorFlowDiffEq.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Bridge for using TensorFlow with SciML differential equation solvers
tools.detailed_description: Allows the integration of TensorFlow with the SciML ecosystem, enabling physics-informed neural network (PINN) workflows and differential equation solving within TensorFlow graphs.

tools.name: diffeqpy
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface for DifferentialEquations.jl
tools.detailed_description: Enables Python users to access the high-performance differential equation solvers from the Julia DifferentialEquations.jl library.

tools.name: diffeqr
tools.one_line_profile: R interface for DifferentialEquations.jl
tools.detailed_description: Enables R users to access the high-performance differential equation solvers from the Julia DifferentialEquations.jl library.

tools.name: NMFk.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Nonnegative Matrix Factorization with physics constraints
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package for Nonnegative Matrix Factorization combined with k-means clustering, incorporating physics constraints for unsupervised scientific machine learning.

tools.name: NTFk.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Nonnegative Tensor Factorization with physics constraints
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package for Nonnegative Tensor Factorization combined with k-means clustering, incorporating physics constraints for unsupervised scientific machine learning.

tools.name: PyPOTS
tools.one_line_profile: Python toolkit for partially-observed time series analysis
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Python toolkit for data mining and machine learning on partially-observed time series, supporting tasks like imputation, classification, and forecasting for scientific and industrial data.

tools.name: Sophon.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient training library for Physics-Informed Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library designed for the efficient, accurate, and streamlined training of Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINNs), leveraging the Julia ecosystem.

tools.name: continuiti
tools.one_line_profile: Library for learning function operators with neural networks
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for learning continuous function operators using neural networks, facilitating operator learning tasks in scientific computing.

tools.name: ppi_py
tools.one_line_profile: Statistical toolkit for prediction-powered inference
tools.detailed_description: A Python package implementing prediction-powered inference, enabling statistically rigorous scientific discovery and estimation using machine learning predictions.

tools.name: Accord.NET
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning and scientific computing framework for .NET
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive .NET framework for scientific computing, including statistical analysis, machine learning, mathematics, and computer vision tools.

tools.name: LatticeQCD.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Lattice QCD simulation code in Julia
tools.detailed_description: A native Julia library for performing Lattice Quantum Chromodynamics (Lattice QCD) simulations with dynamical fermions in 4 dimensions.

tools.name: PyDEns
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for solving ODEs and PDEs using neural networks
tools.detailed_description: PyDEns is a Python framework that allows solving Ordinary and Partial Differential Equations (ODEs & PDEs) using neural networks. It provides a high-level interface to define differential problems and solve them via deep learning optimization.

tools.name: nPSR (PoissonNet)
tools.one_line_profile: Resolution-agnostic 3D shape reconstruction using Fourier Neural Operators
tools.detailed_description: nPSR implements PoissonNet, a method for 3D shape reconstruction that solves the Poisson equation using Fourier Neural Operators. It allows for resolution-agnostic surface reconstruction from point clouds.

tools.name: geo_neural_op
tools.one_line_profile: Geometric Neural Operators for PDEs on point clouds and meshes
tools.detailed_description: This library implements Geometric Neural Operators (GNPs) for machine learning tasks on point-cloud representations, including curvature estimation, shape deformations, and solvers for geometric PDEs.

tools.name: pinnfactory
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight framework for building PINNs with symbolic PDE definitions
tools.detailed_description: pinnfactory is a framework for constructing Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINNs) using symbolic PDE definitions via SymPy. It supports automatic differentiation in PyTorch, flexible architectures, and inverse parameter estimation.

tools.name: FBPINNs
tools.one_line_profile: Finite Basis Physics-Informed Neural Networks solver
tools.detailed_description: FBPINNs is a library for solving forward and inverse partial differential equation problems using Finite Basis Physics-Informed Neural Networks, which improve scalability and accuracy over standard PINNs.

tools.name: pifno
tools.one_line_profile: Physics Informed Fourier Neural Operator implementation
tools.detailed_description: pifno provides an implementation of the Physics Informed Fourier Neural Operator (PI-FNO), combining data-driven and physics-informed approaches for solving PDEs.

tools.name: TorchPhysics
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning library for solving partial differential equations
tools.detailed_description: TorchPhysics is a library developed by Bosch Research that implements various deep learning methods for solving partial differential equations (PDEs), including PINNs and other physics-informed architectures.

tools.name: LPSDA
tools.one_line_profile: Lie Point Symmetry Data Augmentation for Neural PDE Solvers
tools.detailed_description: LPSDA implements a data augmentation strategy based on Lie Point Symmetries to improve the generalization and performance of neural PDE solvers.

tools.name: MP-Neural-PDE-Solvers
tools.one_line_profile: Message Passing Neural PDE Solvers
tools.detailed_description: This repository implements Message Passing Neural PDE Solvers, a graph-based neural network architecture for solving partial differential equations with high accuracy and generalization capabilities.

tools.name: ConvolutionalNeuralOperator
tools.one_line_profile: Convolutional Neural Operators for robust PDE learning
tools.detailed_description: Official implementation of Convolutional Neural Operators (CNO), a robust and accurate architecture for learning operators associated with partial differential equations.

tools.name: DSE-for-NeuralOperators
tools.one_line_profile: Fourier-Based Neural Operators on Arbitrary Domains
tools.detailed_description: Implements methods for applying Fourier-based neural operators to arbitrary domains, extending the capability of FNOs beyond regular grids.

tools.name: GAOT
tools.one_line_profile: Geometry Aware Operator Transformer for PDEs
tools.detailed_description: GAOT (Geometry Aware Operator Transformer) is an efficient and accurate neural surrogate model for solving PDEs on arbitrary domains, leveraging transformer architectures.

tools.name: ar-pde-cnn
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-constrained auto-regressive CNNs for dynamical PDEs
tools.detailed_description: Implements physics-constrained auto-regressive convolutional neural networks designed for modeling dynamical partial differential equations.

tools.name: pde-surrogate
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-constrained deep learning for surrogate modeling
tools.detailed_description: A framework for high-dimensional surrogate modeling and uncertainty quantification using physics-constrained deep learning, enabling simulation without labeled data.

tools.name: torchspde
tools.one_line_profile: Neural Stochastic PDEs solver
tools.detailed_description: torchspde provides resolution-invariant modelling of continuous spatiotemporal dynamics using Neural Stochastic PDEs.

tools.name: PYRO-NN
tools.one_line_profile: Python Reconstruction Operators in Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: PYRO-NN provides a high-level Python API for reconstruction operators in neural networks, facilitating the integration of known physics/reconstruction algorithms into deep learning pipelines.

tools.name: AL4PDE
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for Active Learning for Neural PDE Solvers
tools.detailed_description: AL4PDE is a benchmark suite designed to evaluate active learning strategies for neural PDE solvers, facilitating the development of data-efficient training methods.

tools.name: deeponet-acoustic-wave-prop
tools.one_line_profile: DeepONet solver for 3D acoustic wave propagation
tools.detailed_description: A specialized DeepONet implementation for training and inferring acoustic wave propagation in 3D environments.

tools.name: PhyGNNet
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-informed Graph Neural Network for spatiotemporal PDEs
tools.detailed_description: PhyGNNet is a framework for solving spatiotemporal PDEs using Physics-informed Graph Neural Networks, enabling simulation on unstructured grids.

tools.name: En-DeepONet
tools.one_line_profile: En-DeepONet architecture for operator regression
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the En-DeepONet architecture, a variant of Deep Operator Networks designed for operator regression tasks.

tools.name: hp-VPINNs
tools.one_line_profile: Variational Physics-Informed Neural Network with domain decomposition
tools.detailed_description: hp-VPINNs is a general framework to solve differential equations using variational physics-informed neural networks combined with domain decomposition (hp-refinement).

tools.name: VCMeshConv
tools.one_line_profile: Fully convolutional mesh autoencoder for arbitrary registered meshes
tools.detailed_description: VCMeshConv implements a non-template-specific fully convolutional mesh autoencoder. It provides novel convolution and pooling operators for learning latent representations of registered meshes, useful for 3D scientific data compression and surrogate modeling.

tools.name: U-FNO
tools.one_line_profile: Enhanced Fourier Neural Operator for multiphase flow
tools.detailed_description: U-FNO is a deep learning model based on Fourier Neural Operators, enhanced for simulating multiphase flow problems.

tools.name: PINNacle
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive benchmark suite for Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINNs)
tools.detailed_description: A codebase serving as a benchmark for evaluating various Physics-Informed Neural Network methods on solving Partial Differential Equations, providing standardized tasks and metrics.

tools.name: IDRLnet
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-Informed Neural Network (PINN) toolbox for modeling and solving PDEs
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolbox designed for modeling and solving physics-based problems using Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINNs) in a systematic way.

tools.name: sparse
tools.one_line_profile: Sparse matrix formats and linear algebra library for Go
tools.detailed_description: A library providing sparse matrix formats and linear algebra operations, supporting scientific and machine learning applications in the Go programming language.

tools.name: MLweb
tools.one_line_profile: JavaScript libraries for scientific computing and machine learning
tools.detailed_description: A collection of JavaScript libraries (LALolib, StatLib, OptimLib) for scientific computing tasks such as linear algebra, statistics, and optimization, enabling science in the web browser.

tools.name: DeepXDE
tools.one_line_profile: A library for scientific machine learning and physics-informed learning
tools.detailed_description: DeepXDE is a comprehensive library for scientific machine learning, offering support for Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINNs), DeepONet, and other operator learning methods to solve partial differential equations (PDEs) and inverse problems.

tools.name: CFDBench
tools.one_line_profile: A large-scale benchmark for machine learning methods in fluid dynamics
tools.detailed_description: CFDBench provides a standardized benchmark suite for evaluating machine learning methods in computational fluid dynamics (CFD), including datasets and evaluation metrics for various flow conditions.

tools.name: PINA
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-Informed Neural networks for Advanced modeling
tools.detailed_description: PINA is a Python package providing an intuitive interface for solving differential equations using Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINNs), developed by SISSA mathLab.

tools.name: neuraloperator
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive library for learning in infinite dimension with neural operators
tools.detailed_description: NeuralOperator is the official library for Fourier Neural Operators (FNO) and related methods, enabling resolution-invariant solution of partial differential equations (PDEs) using deep learning.

tools.name: NodeLab
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB repository for meshfree node generation and PINN/DeepONet implementation
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB toolbox for generating nodes and adaptive refinement for meshfree methods, including implementations of Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINNs) and DeepONets for solving PDEs.

tools.name: PDEBench
tools.one_line_profile: Extensive benchmark suite for scientific machine learning and PDE solving
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive benchmark dataset and evaluation suite for Scientific Machine Learning (SciML), providing diverse PDE problems and metrics to evaluate neural PDE solvers.

tools.name: NeuralFoil
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-informed aerodynamics analysis tool for airfoils
tools.detailed_description: A practical airfoil aerodynamics analysis tool leveraging physics-informed machine learning to provide rapid and accurate predictions, designed for end-users in Python.

tools.name: slim
tools.one_line_profile: Stable learning modules for physics-informed machine learning
tools.detailed_description: A library from PNNL providing drop-in replacements for PyTorch linear layers to enhance stability and incorporate inductive priors in physics-informed machine learning applications.

tools.name: pointcloud-differential
tools.one_line_profile: Differential geometry operators on point clouds for PDEs
tools.detailed_description: A library for computing gradients, divergence, and Laplacian on point clouds, facilitating the solution of PDEs on irregular geometries and learning anisotropic features.

tools.name: pyapprox
tools.one_line_profile: High-dimensional approximation and scientific machine learning tools
tools.detailed_description: A flexible library from Sandia National Laboratories for high-dimensional approximation, uncertainty quantification, and scientific machine learning.

tools.name: torch-cfd
tools.one_line_profile: Neural Operator-Assisted Computational Fluid Dynamics in PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: A library providing differentiable CFD solvers and neural operator integrations in PyTorch, enabling hybrid physics-ML simulations for fluid dynamics.

tools.name: dfno
tools.one_line_profile: Distributed Fourier Neural Operators library
tools.detailed_description: A library extension for training Fourier Neural Operators (FNO) in a distributed manner, enabling scaling to larger models and datasets.

tools.name: TensorDiffEq
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable Physics-Informed Deep Learning library on TensorFlow
tools.detailed_description: An efficient and scalable library for Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINNs) and scientific machine learning built on top of TensorFlow, supporting multi-worker distributed computing.

tools.name: Neural-Solver-Library
tools.one_line_profile: Library for advanced neural PDE solvers
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive library from Tsinghua University providing implementations of various advanced neural PDE solvers and operator learning methods.

tools.name: PhiFlow
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable PDE solving framework for machine learning and physics simulation
tools.detailed_description: PhiFlow is an open-source simulation toolkit built for differentiable physics and scientific machine learning. It allows users to write fluid and physics simulations in Python that can be integrated with PyTorch, TensorFlow, or Jax for gradient-based optimization and learning.

tools.name: apebench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark suite for autoregressive neural emulation of PDEs
tools.detailed_description: ApeBench is a comprehensive benchmark suite designed to evaluate autoregressive neural networks for PDE emulation. It provides a standardized set of 1D, 2D, and 3D PDE problems, training protocols, and metrics to assess the stability and accuracy of AI-based physics solvers.

tools.name: mystic
tools.one_line_profile: Constrained nonlinear optimization framework for scientific machine learning and UQ
tools.detailed_description: Mystic is a robust framework for high-dimensional constrained nonlinear optimization. It is widely used in scientific machine learning for inverse problems, parameter estimation, and uncertainty quantification (UQ), offering capabilities to handle complex constraints and penalty functions.

tools.name: Kinetic.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Universal modeling and simulation library for fluid mechanics and SciML in Julia
tools.detailed_description: Kinetic.jl is a portable finite volume toolbox written in Julia for computational fluid dynamics (CFD). It integrates with the SciML ecosystem to support physics-informed machine learning, enabling simulations from the Boltzmann equation to multiscale and multiphysics flows.
